title: Zoom Feedback Validator App
description: Developed a web application that analyses and validates user feedback from Zoom sessions using Natural Language Processing. The app classifies feedback as positive, negative, or neutral, and provides suggestions for improvement based on sentiment analysis

title: Habit Tracker App
description: Built a web-based habit tracker that motivates users through gamification, including streaks, points, and achievement badges. Designed a responsive dashboard with real-time progress tracking and leaderboard features.

title: Smart Hostel App
description: Built a web-based system for room allocation, tenant management, fee tracking, and complaints. Added role-based dashboards for admins and tenants to streamline daily operations.
